description: Despite anti-union busting efforts, 10 Google Fiber workers who are contractors for BDS Connected Solutions have unionized with the AWU through a majority vote. They are notably the first unionized Google Fiber workers and Alphabet Workers Union’s first official bargaining unit.
author: wynniechan
addresses: Google Fiber Space, 8615, Northwest Prairie View Road, Kansas City, Platte County, Missouri, 64153, United States
